Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 2025

Welcome to Cloud101. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you access our website or interact with our services.

1. Introduction

Cloud101 (“we”, “our”, “us”) is committed to safeguarding your privacy. By accessing our website, you acknowledge and consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

2. Information We Collect

2.1 Personal Information

You may voluntarily provide us with the following details:

  • Full name
  • Email address
  • Contact number
  • Messages or feedback
  • Newsletter subscription details

2.2 Automatically Collected Data

When you visit Cloud101, we automatically collect:

  • IP address
  • Browser and device information
  • Pages viewed and time spent
  • Traffic source and referring URLs
  • Cookies and tracking data

2.3 Cookies & Analytics

We use cookies and analytical tools (such as Google Analytics) to enhance your experience and gather insights into website performance and user behavior.

3. How We Use Your Information

The data we collect is used to:

  • Improve our website and services
  • Respond to your queries and support requests
  • Send updates, newsletters, and informational content
  • Perform analytics and website performance monitoring
  • Enhance site security and prevent misuse

We do **not** sell your personal information to any third parties.

4. Sharing of Information

4.1 Service Providers

We may share data with trusted vendors (hosting, analytics, email services) who assist us in operating Cloud101.

4.2 Legal Requirements

We may disclose information if required by law, legal process, or government authorities.

4.3 Business Transfers

In the event of a merger, acquisition, or business restructuring, user data may be transferred as part of business assets.

5. Data Storage & Security

We implement industry-standard measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular system reviews. However, no digital system is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute protection.

6. Your Rights

You may contact us to request:

  • Access to your data
  • Correction of incorrect data
  • Deletion of your personal information
  • Unsubscription from newsletters
  • Withdrawal of consent

Contact: support@cloud101.in

7. Children’s Privacy

Cloud101 does not knowingly collect data from children under the age of 13. If you believe such data exists, please contact us for immediate removal.

8. External Links

Cloud101 may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. Users are encouraged to review the privacy policies of external sites.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. Changes take effect immediately upon posting. Please review this page periodically for updates.

10. Contact Us

For any questions, feedback, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, contact us at:
support@cloud101.in
